### getCostValue() {#afd02d39cdcdde259c13b9707f3da96ba}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static unsigned getCostValue (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &amp; C)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Get the unsigned <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> of given <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> object.

Assumes the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> is always non-negative, which is true for both TCK&#95;CodeSize and TCK&#95;Latency, and always Valid.

Definition at line <a href="#l00664">664</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionspecialization-cpp">FunctionSpecialization.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstCostVisitor::canEliminateSuccessor(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0d10fe510ced2849a8074fe81e5d04ce">all&#95;of</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">predecessors</a>(Succ), &#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, BB, Succ, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++ &lt; <a href="#acee8c1ac3c2e385c144ed47395eb76e4">MaxBlockPredecessors</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">           (Pred == BB || Pred == Succ || !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcostvisitor/#af8ad6a0f5c59f6dc9519445ca0e531f2">isBlockExecutable</a>(Pred));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Estimates the codesize savings due to dead code after constant propagation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// \\p WorkList represents the basic blocks of a specialization which will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// eventually become dead once we replace instructions that are known to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constants. The successors of such blocks are added to the list as long as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the \\p Solver found they were executable prior to specialization, and only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if all their predecessors are dead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> InstCostVisitor::estimateBasicBlocks(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;WorkList) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> CodeSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Accumulate the codesize savings of each basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = WorkList.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These blocks are considered dead as far as the InstCostVisitor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is concerned. They haven&#39;t been proven dead yet by the Solver,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but may become if we propagate the specialization arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Solver.isBlockExecutable(BB) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;BB already found dead by IPSCCP!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DeadBlocks.insert(BB).second)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To support specializing recursive functions, it is important to propagate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constant arguments because after a first iteration of specialisation, a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reduced example may look like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     define internal void @RecursiveFn(i32&#42; arg1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       %temp = alloca i32, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       store i32 2 i32&#42; %temp, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       call void @RecursiveFn.1(i32&#42; nonnull %temp)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       ret void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before a next iteration, we need to propagate the constant like so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which allows further specialization in next iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     @funcspec.arg = internal constant i32 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     define internal void @someFunc(i32&#42; arg1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       call void @otherFunc(i32&#42; nonnull @funcspec.arg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       ret void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See if there are any new constant values for the callers of \\p F via</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack variables and promote them to global variables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FunctionSpecializer::promoteConstantStackValues(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (User &#42;U : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;users()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CallInst&gt;</a>(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">        !<a href="#a09b77c00460c8116385e3c8cbba0d7a3">ForceSpecialization</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (<a href="#a3c831cb289e74e717efc9b3e66ca7747">SpecializeLiteralConstant</a> || !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.hasFnAttribute(Attribute::NoInline));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the code metrics reveal that we shouldn&#39;t duplicate the function,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or if the code size implies that this function is easy to get inlined,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then we shouldn&#39;t specialize it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp/#a6f3004139ef53bc2cf206b8864976928">Metrics</a>.notDuplicatable || !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp/#a6f3004139ef53bc2cf206b8864976928">Metrics</a>.NumInsts.isValid() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When specialization on literal constants is disabled, only consider</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the call site has attribute minsize set, that callsite won&#39;t be</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the parent of the call site will never be executed, we don&#39;t need</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Solver.isBlockExecutable(CS.getParent()))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">      S.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/specsig/#a1b88d6bbcb32262d5a8a34542e7b4e7b">Args</a>.push&#95;back(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we have encountered the same specialisation already.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = UniqueSpecs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(S); It != UniqueSpecs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Existing specialisation. Add the call to the list to rewrite, unless</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it&#39;s a recursive call. A specialisation, generated because of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recursive call may end up as not the best specialisation for all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the cloned instances of this call, which result from specialising</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// functions. Hence we don&#39;t rewrite the call directly, but match it with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the best specialisation once all specialisations are known.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CS.getFunction() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> = It-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AllSpecs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a>&#93;.CallSites.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&amp;CS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate the specialisation gain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> CodeSize;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InstCostVisitor Visitor = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionspecializer/#aba940b27287e9bf02cb1eb2abeb511fc">getInstCostVisitorFor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ArgInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> : S.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/specsig/#a1b88d6bbcb32262d5a8a34542e7b4e7b">Args</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a09b77c00460c8116385e3c8cbba0d7a3">ForceSpecialization</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   &lt;&lt; Score &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; (&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; (Score &#42; 100 / FuncSize) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;%)&#125;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Score &gt; <a href="#ab17d1fcd1112b5f98462a01538e6b925">MinInliningBonus</a> &#42; FuncSize / 100)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;FnSpecialization: Specialization bonus &#123;CodeSize = &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Minimum codesize savings.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CodeSizeSavings &lt; <a href="#a9ad681713d92d4500ead00bbccbdb6a6">MinCodeSizeSavings</a> &#42; FuncSize / 100)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lazily compute the Latency, to avoid unnecessarily computing BFI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LatencySavings =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="#afd02d39cdcdde259c13b9707f3da96ba">getCostValue</a>(Visitor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcostvisitor/#a566bce9201a664cbda002641a19c3913">getLatencySavingsForKnownConstants</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;FnSpecialization: Specialization bonus &#123;Latency = &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   &lt;&lt; LatencySavings &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; (&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   &lt;&lt; (LatencySavings &#42; 100 / FuncSize) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;%)&#125;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Minimum latency savings.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LatencySavings &lt; <a href="#ac9905e3278daa66a2100405ed9f7aa5e">MinLatencySavings</a> &#42; FuncSize / 100)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Maximum codesize growth.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((FunctionGrowth&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>&#93; + SpecSize) / FuncSize &gt; <a href="#a6cfe0d10e37ac46e94e5ae7af5e252f9">MaxCodeSizeGrowth</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Score += std::max(CodeSizeSavings, LatencySavings);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Discard unprofitable specialisations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsProfitable())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a new specialisation entry.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute the inlining bonus for replacing argument \\p A with constant \\p C.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The below heuristic is only concerned with exposing inlining</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// opportunities via indirect call promotion. If the argument is not a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (potentially casted) function pointer, give up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FunctionSpecializer::getInliningBonus(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/argument">Argument</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#adfebd8c4ae29ccd84c600c1e65d6b807a86408593c34af77fdd90df932f8b5261">Function</a> &#42;CalledFunction = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Function&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;stripPointerCasts());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CalledFunction)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get TTI for the called function (used for the inline cost).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;CalleeTTI = (GetTTI)(&#42;CalledFunction);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look at all the call sites whose called value is the argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Specializing the function on the argument would allow these indirect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calls to be promoted to direct calls. If the indirect call promotion</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would likely enable the called function to be inlined, specializing is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// good idea.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InliningBonus = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (User &#42;U : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-&gt;users()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;CallInst&gt;</a>(U) &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;InvokeInst&gt;</a>(U))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CS = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;CallBase&gt;</a>(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CS-&gt;getCalledOperand() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CS-&gt;getFunctionType() != CalledFunction-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a21075305f0e463b24aafc2fb99514ace">getFunctionType</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the cost of inlining the called function at this call site. Note</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that this is only an estimate. The called function may eventually</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// change in a way that leads to it not being inlined here, even though</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inlining looks profitable now. For example, one of its called</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// functions may be inlined into it, making the called function too large</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be inlined into this call site.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We apply a boost for performing indirect call promotion by increasing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the default threshold by the threshold for indirect calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Params = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba7063dea024346c7b70099c63703f50">getInlineParams</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Params.DefaultThreshold += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/inlineconstants/#a6e878d84d424326fd6132b320f075c97">InlineConstants::IndirectCallThreshold</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InlineCost IC =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f5f248d08aa55c63e5bc7a8304a7319">getInlineCost</a>(&#42;CS, CalledFunction, Params, CalleeTTI, GetAC, GetTLI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We clamp the bonus for this call to be between zero and the default</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// threshold.</span></CodeLine>
